mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_QUERY ( F_QUERY_ID, F_OWNER_CLASS_ID, F_QUERY_NAME, F_FILTER, F_ORDER, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ queryId }, #{ ownerClassId }, #{ queryName }, #{ filter }, #{ order }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_QUERY SET F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = #{ ownerClassId }, F_QUERY_NAME = #{ queryName }, F_FILTER = #{ filter }, F_ORDER = #{ order }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_QUERY_ID = #{ queryId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_QUERY_ID AS "queryId", T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", T1.F_QUERY_NAME AS "queryName", T1.F_FILTER AS "filter", T1.F_ORDER AS "order", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_TITLE AS "owner_title" FROM T_QUERY T1 LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T2.F_CLASS_ID WHERE T1.F_QUERY_ID = #{ queryId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_QUERY T1

SELECT T1.F_CLASS_ID AS "classId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_CLASS_NAME AS "className", T1.F_ORDER_EXPR AS "orderExpr", T1.F_TITLE_EXPR AS "titleExpr", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_TITLE AS "owner_title" FROM T_CLASS T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_CLASS_ID = #{ ownerClassId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_CLASS T1
